TopicTitle: My attempt at a Duna lander goes hilariously wrong.

Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/a/maTGF

To clarify, the two SAS modules right above the first stage were covered by offsetting the 2.5m to 3.75m upwards and making, kinda like, a sleeve for the SAS since the adapter is hollow. Apparently the link was quite weak, whether as a result of offsetting the adapter or not, I don't know.

Hope you enjoyed it as much as I did making it!

-Slab

I embedded your album for you.

Ahh, thanks! New to the forum, I didn't know how to do that

ahahahah

I love it. I'm trying to work up the nerve to go to Duna but I'm so worried and I'm afraid of something going catastrophically wrong like it did with my mun landing when my launcher ran out of fuel upon landing, and then the rescue mission exploded twice before I landed successfully, and then when I finally landed properly it ran out of fuel too, so I finally had to resort to mechjeb to get both kerbals home.
